title: App Crash v.6.1.0
body:
Animation shows 1 second and then I see a permanent crash when trying to show the animation. If lottie_asyncUpdates is excluded from xml - all is working as expected.

Lottie version: 6.1.0
Device: Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 
Android: 6.0.1, MIUI 10.2.1.0

Enabled: **app:lottie_asyncUpdates="enabled"**
